After Chilling With Trio Ranveer, Alia & Vicky, Karan Johar Is Looking Forward To Directing 'Takht'
After Chilling With Trio Ranveer, Alia & Vicky, Karan Johar Is Looking Forward To Directing 'Takht'
After Kalank, Dharma productions' next is also again a historical drama that will star Ranveer Singh, Alia Bhatt, Vicky Kaushal, Kareena Kapoor Khan and Bhumi Pednekar. The film is a period drama and it will be based on a true historical account.
After the Filmfare awards last night, KJo partied with Ranveer Singh, Vicky Kaushal and Alia Bhatt and the pictures and videos that have paved way on the internet prove that all of them indeed had fun!
Posting pictures with his cast and close friends, KJo expressed his excitement over beginning this ambitious project.
That's not all. After the wrap-up, Ranbir Kapoor, Deepika Padukone and Shah Rukh Khan joined the party and it turned into a house-party. In case you want to know how Bollywood stars enjoy and have fun, here are the pictures and videos that will give you a closer look!
